text: This is a list of Luxembourgish European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Luxembourgish actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award. ==Main categories== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="5%"|Year !width="18%"|Award !width="28%"|Recipient !width="10%"|Status !width="38%"|Note |- | 2009 || Best European Co-Producer || Jani Thiltges || || |- | rowspan="2"| 2013 || Best Animated Feature Film || The Congress || ||Israeli-German-Polish-Luxembourgish-Franch-Belgian co- production |- | Best Animated Feature Film || Pinocchio || ||Italian- Luxembourgish-Franch-Belgian co-production |- |} ==External links== * Nominees and winners at the European Film Academy website ==See also== * List of Luxembourgish submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film Category:Cinema of Luxembourg Category:European Film Awards Category:Lists of mass media in Luxembourg
title: List of Luxembourgish European Film Award winners and nominees
